subject: Your loan application is waiting
body:
Dear Ho me Owner

Are you still paying too much mortgage interest?. You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $267,000 for 
$695 per month.

Please respond asap.
http://ilook.tw/dd21


 


Dillon Kerry 
Loan Approval Department


We are discreet sheep; we wait to see how the drove is going, and then go with the drove.	-Mark Twain [Samuel Langhornne Clemens] (1835-1910)
